scripts.test:int: set TEST_ENV=int&& ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/.bin/playwright test --project=int --headed
scripts.test:qa: set TEST_ENV=qa&& ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/.bin/playwright test --project=qa --headed
scripts.test:allure: npm run clean:allure && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/.bin/playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts && npx allure generate src/reporting/allure-results --clean -o src/reporting/allure-report
